message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $11500. This is a one-time opportunity, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something a bit more reasonable. Would you be willing to meet me at $10800?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11200. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll find it reasonable.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10500?
I'm not willing to go that low, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I can offer it to you for $11000, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you'll accept it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10000?
